title: TBD (but something about Homomorphic Encryption)
description:
I have been tasked to submit a talk proposal, originaly on Multiparty Homomorphic Encryption as a place holder to secure the talk session, but there are three possible talks I could give:
1) Introduction to Multiparty Homomorphic Encryption from RLWE
2) IDASH PRIVACY & SECURITY WORKSHOP 2024: Presentation of the submitted solution (secure evaluation of a transformer with CKKS to classify protein sequences)
3) The pitfalls of Fully Homomorphic Encryption: when IND-CPA security is not enough
